thread.title: Bond Vigilante wins Belmont Park feature
thread.title_full: Bond Vigilante wins Belmont Park feature - Yahoo Sports

author: sports.yahoo.com
title: Bond Vigilante wins Belmont Park feature
text:
NEW YORK (AP) -- Bond Vigilante beat Gypsum Johnny by 1 3/4 lengths Wednesday in the $65,000 allowance feature for New York breds at Belmont Park.
The 5-year-old was claimed by trainer Bruce Levine for $50,000 from his previous start. The acquisition paid immediate dividends as Bond Vigilante raced to his sixth win in 15 starts.
Ridden by Jose Ortiz, the winner ran 6 1/2 furlongs in 1:16.17 and paid $11.40, $4.90 and $3.20.
Gypsum Johnny returned $6.30 and $3.40, and Rectify, the 2-1 favorite, paid $2.70 to show.
